item.text: When he had said these things, Jesus went out with his disciples across the Kidron Valley. There was an orchard there, and he and his disciples went into it.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st>, the one who <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="4863" class="">met</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="4178">many times</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101">disciples</st>.)<n id="2" />
So Judas obtained a squad of soldiers and some officers of the chief priests and Pharisees. They came to the orchard with lanterns and torches and weapons.
Then Jesus, because he knew everything that was going to happen to him, came and asked them, “Who are you looking for?”

They <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2424">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st>.” He <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510">am</st> he.” (<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st>, the one who <st data-num="3860" class="">betrayed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, was <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> there <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846">them</st>.)<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510">am</st> he,” they <st data-num="565 3694">retreated</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> to the <st data-num="5476" class="">ground</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> are you <st data-num="2212">looking for</st>?” <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2424">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st>.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am he. <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> you are <st data-num="2212">looking for</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="863" class="">let</st> <st data-num="3778">these men</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st>.”<n id="4" />
He said this to fulfill the word he had spoken, “I have not lost a single one of those whom you gave me.”
Then Simon Peter, who had a sword, pulled it out and struck the high priest’s slave, cutting off his right ear. (Now the slave’s name was Malchus.)
But Jesus said to Peter, “Put your sword back into its sheath! Am I not to drink the cup that the Father has given me?”
Then the squad of soldiers with their commanding officer and the officers of the Jewish leaders arrested Jesus and tied him up.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> him <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="452" class="">Annas</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> the <st data-num="3995" class="">father-in-law</st> of <st data-num="2533" class="">Caiaphas</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1763" class="">year</st>.<n id="2" />
(Now it was Caiaphas who had advised the Jewish leaders that it was to their advantage that one man die for the people.)
Simon Peter and another disciple followed them as they brought Jesus to Annas. (Now the other disciple was acquainted with the high priest, and he went with Jesus into the high priest’s courtyard.)

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> was left <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> by the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st> who was <st data-num="1110" class="">acquainted</st> with the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">spoke</st> to the slave girl who <st data-num="2377">watched the door</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1521" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1521" class="">inside</st>.

The <st data-num="3814" class="">girl</st><n id="1" /> who was the <st data-num="2377" class="">doorkeeper</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You’re</st> <st data-num="3361">not</st> one <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444">man’s</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> you?”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1565" class="">He</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="3" /> “I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>.”
(Now the slaves and the guards were standing around a charcoal fire they had made, warming themselves because it was cold. Peter also was standing with them, warming himself.)
While this was happening, the high priest questioned Jesus about his disciples and about his teaching.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">publicly</st> to the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>. <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2453">Jewish people</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4905">assemble together</st>. <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st><n id="5" /> have <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2927" class="">secret</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> do you <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>? <st data-num="2065" class="">Ask</st> those who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="5101">what</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2980">said</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">They</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>.”

When <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> had <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the high priest’s <st data-num="5257" class="">officers</st> who <st data-num="3936">stood nearby</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">struck</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">him</st> on the <st data-num="4475" class="">face</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3779">Is that the way</st> you <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> I have <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st> <st data-num="2560">something wrong</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3140" class="">confirm</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4012">what is</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">wrong</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I spoke <st data-num="2573" class="">correctly</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> <st data-num="1194" class="">strike</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?”
Then Annas sent him, still tied up, to Caiaphas the high priest.
Meanwhile Simon Peter was standing in the courtyard warming himself. They said to him, “You aren’t one of his disciples too, are you?” Peter denied it: “I am not!”

<st data-num="1520" class="">One</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest’s</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4773" class="">relative</st> of the man <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="5621" class="">ear</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> had <st data-num="609">cut off</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “Did <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2779" class="">orchard</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?”<n id="4" />
Then Peter denied it again, and immediately a rooster crowed.

Then they brought Jesus from Caiaphas to the Roman governor’s residence. (Now it was very early morning.) They did not go into the governor’s residence so they would not be ceremonially defiled, but could eat the Passover meal.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> <st data-num="2724" class="">accusation</st><n id="1" /> do you <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="2596">against</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>?”<n id="2" />
They replied, “If this man were not a criminal, we would not have handed him over to you.”
Pilate told them, “Take him yourselves and pass judgment on him according to your own law!” The Jewish leaders replied, “We cannot legally put anyone to death.”
(This happened to fulfill the word Jesus had spoken when he indicated what kind of death he was going to die.)
So Pilate went back into the governor’s residence, summoned Jesus, and asked him, “Are you the king of the Jews?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “Are <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4572">your own</st> initiative,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> have <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?”
Pilate answered, “I am not a Jew, am I? Your own people and your chief priests handed you over to me. What have you done?”

Jesus replied, “My kingdom is not from this world. If my kingdom were from this world, my servants would be fighting to keep me from being handed over to the Jewish authorities. But as it is, my kingdom is not from here.”

<st data-num="3767">Then</st> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3766">So</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> a <st data-num="935" class="">king</st>!” <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="935" class="">king</st>. <st data-num="1519" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this reason</st> I was <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this reason</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>—<st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> to <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>. <st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">belongs</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listens</st> to<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>.”

Pilate asked, “What is truth?”

When he had said this he went back outside to the Jewish leaders and announced, “I find no basis for an accusation against him.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4914" class="">custom</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> prisoner<n id="1" /> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> do you <st data-num="1014" class="">want</st> me to <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>?”
Then they shouted back, “Not this man, but Barabbas!” (Now Barabbas was a revolutionary.)
